verses.name: Genesis 24:1
verses.text: And Abraham was old, and well stricken in age: and the Lord had blessed Abraham in all things.

verses.name: Genesis 24:2
verses.text: And Abraham said unto his eldest servant of his house, that ruled over all that he had, Put, I pray thee, thy hand under my thigh:

verses.name: Genesis 24:3
verses.text: And I will make thee swear by the Lord, the God of heaven, and the God of the earth, that thou shalt not take a wife unto my son of the daughters of the Canaanites, among whom I dwell:
